content.raw:
[Test failure in Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo-gpu/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/98/testReport/junit/%28root%29/ModelAlign_TEST/AlignXMin/); I can reproduce it on my machine too:
~~~
$ gazebo/gui/UNIT_ModelAlign_TEST 
********* Start testing of ModelAlign_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : ModelAlign_TEST::initTestCase()
FAIL!  : ModelAlign_TEST::AlignXMin() Caught unhandled exception
   Loc: [qtestcase.cpp(1927)]
Totals: 1 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of ModelAlign_TEST *********
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~

The backtrace isn't so interesting:
~~~
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f9d42552f79 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
#1  0x00007f9d42556388 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007f9d42b586b5 in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007f9d42b56836 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007f9d42b56863 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007f9d42b56af6 in __cxa_rethrow () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007f9d4461aed1 in QTest::qExec(QObject*, int, char**) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4
#7  0x0000000000407765 in main (argc=1, argv=0x7fff029fc338) at gazebo/gui/ModelAlign_TEST.cc:713
(gdb)
~~~
content.html:
Test failure in Jenkins; I can reproduce it on my machine too:

$ gazebo/gui/UNIT_ModelAlign_TEST 
********* Start testing of ModelAlign_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : ModelAlign_TEST::initTestCase()
FAIL!  : ModelAlign_TEST::AlignXMin() Caught unhandled exception
   Loc: [qtestcase.cpp(1927)]
Totals: 1 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of ModelAlign_TEST *********
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
Aborted (core dumped)

The backtrace isn't so interesting:

(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f9d42552f79 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
#1  0x00007f9d42556388 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007f9d42b586b5 in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007f9d42b56836 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007f9d42b56863 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007f9d42b56af6 in __cxa_rethrow () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007f9d4461aed1 in QTest::qExec(QObject*, int, char**) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4
#7  0x0000000000407765 in main (argc=1, argv=0x7fff029fc338) at gazebo/gui/ModelAlign_TEST.cc:713
(gdb)
